Reviews.Title: wow just great
Reviews.Author: Johnathan Miller
Reviews.Content: Tv was much more when it arrived! Sound quality and picture was excellent! Very slick look to the tv itself and the touch buttons make it look like a major step up for the price! I place to buy more in the future

ProductInfo.Features:
Brilliant LED images with low power consumption
SRS TruSurround XT sound performance for unmatched audio
Seamless connectivity with 3 HDMI inputs and Easylink
High Definition Resolution
Energy Star rated for low power consumption
ProductInfo.Name: Philips 32PFL4508/F7 32-Inch 60Hz LED HDTV (Black)
